note:
Hi! I’m Ollie. Aside from working as a data analyst, I spend quite a lot of time online, mostly gaming. Path of exile, Diablo 2 and occasional CS:GO - HMU for a match or two.

Also, following the latest internet privacy and security trends is a huge part of both my work and leisure time, so I’ll be sharing my opinion regarding various related topics. Oh, and did I mention, I'm a proud owner of two cats–Bill and Steven?
